title: The Road Back Home: A Bittersweet Northern Childhood
description: In a story full of wonderful humour, emotional candour and tough times is revealed a quietly epic family saga set amid the pit villages of north east England. It stretches from the 1920s, to the final closing of the mine and his motherâ€™s death in 1999.From the Hardcover edition.
author: Sid Waddell
